name: Stitch (Dziek)
description:
Stitch is a one button arcade game with a secret.

---

Stitch is an arcade game in the mode of TEMPRES by Tak. I  wanted to do something similar, but with  a twist. 

I  added a code to crack. It's currently a bit too esoteric, but I'm working on getting the balance right. The idea is to surprise the player, but I'd like everyone to "get" it.

When the player gets a high enough score, an outer ring will appear. It usually rotates   counter clockwise, but on certain scores it'll rotate clockwise. Get three of these in a row, and the game will zoom into itself, and the player will be presented with the "Hello" text. From then on the game is a text adventure. 

The idea is to elicit a series of "WHAT"'s from the player, over the course of a 10 minute adventure.

Above is a playable proof of concept.  There's no audio in the build above.

There's also a video of a full playthrough.
